entry.title: SteamË¥≠‰π∞ÊîªÁï•
entry.content: // Set the date we're counting down to var countDownDate = new Date("Jun 22, 2018 01:00:00").getTime(); // Update the count down every 1 second var x = setInterval(function() { // Get todays date and time var now = new Date().getTime(); // Find the distance between now an the count down date var distance = countDownDate - now; // Time calculations for days, hours, minutes and seconds var days = Math.floor(distance / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); var hours = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60)); var minutes = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60)); var seconds = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60)) / 1000); // Output the result in an element with id="countdown" document.getElementById("countdown").innerHTML = "Â§è‰øÉÂÄíËÆ°Êó∂ " + days + "d " + hours + "h " + minutes + "m " + seconds + "s "; // If the count down is over, write some text if (distance < 0) { clearInterval(x); document.getElementById("countdown").innerHTML = "Â§è‰øÉÁÅ´ÁÉ≠ËøõË°åÔºÅ"; } }, 1000); Êïô‰Ω†Â¶Ç‰ΩïËñÖGËÉñÁæäÊØõ entry.title: Build the "Tunnel"
entry.content: Access be blocked by the GFW?Build a Shadowsocks service on your own If you don‚Äôt want to read the introductions, go to Quick Start directlyCannot understand English? See Chinese edition here As President Xi came into power, the Internet access in China has become more and more restrictive. Most foreign websites are blocked in mainland China under the country‚Äôs policy of Internet censorship, which include Google, Youtube, Facebook, Twitter, Wikipedia (CN site) and so on. To visit these websites, you need to break through blockade of GFW. What is shadowsocks?Shadowsocks is an open-source encrypted proxy project, widely used in mainland China to circumvent Internet censorship. It was created in 2012 by a Chinese programmer named ‚Äúclowwindy‚Äù, and multiple implementations of the protocol have been made available since. Typically, the client software will open a socks5 proxy on the machine it is run, which internet traffic can then be directed towards, similarly to an SSH tunnel. Unlike an SSH tunnel, shadowsocks can also proxy UDP traffic. There are several different types of shadowsocks now but all of them are based on socks5 protocol. (Read more in Wikipedia) What is the different between VPN and SS?Technically, shadowsocks has nothing to do with VPN. It‚Äôs not a VPN, it‚Äôs a proxy. VPN is a virtual network interface which you can send everything through it. Proxy is a server used to forward data to another. There are two mainly difference between them. To use a proxy, you had to let program know there is a proxy. But you don‚Äôt have to config programs to use VPN. You can transfer any kind of data through VPN. With proxy, only TCP can be delivered. (actually, in some version of shadowsocks, UDP also works) (Read more in this Quora) Why is a VPS needed?Look at the following picture. In the practical use, encrypted data is transferred through the VPS(SS Server) so that the GFW doesn‚Äôt know where is the data from, and will naturally allow the data to pass through. Make sure these websites are accessible at the location of your VPS. Make sure the IP address of the VPS haven‚Äôt been blocked by the GFW. The shorter the distance between you location and the location of your VPS, the faster your Internet will be. Quick StartBuy a VPS BandweagonHost:        Official Website 1 (be blocked in China)        Official Website 2       Chinese Site (not official) Vultr Linode Digital Ocean Please check this link to get more information and suggestions If you know nothing about technology or have difficulty learning about it, please select BandweagonHost KVM versions. Remember to search for discount code before you pay. Install BBRThis step is optional but recommended, because it makes your VPS perform in a higher level. You don‚Äôt need this step if you choose Quick install from BandweagonHost. See how to install in this article. Install shadowsocks on the VPSQuick install from BandweagonHost control panelBecause of some issues, new buyers cannot install ss from the panel automatically. If you don‚Äôt have shadowsocks choice, go to Install from packet by ÁßãÊ∞¥ÈÄ∏ÂÜ∞ directly. Go to BWH services page and click on ‚ÄúKiwiVM Control Panel‚Äù. Click on the ‚ÄúStop‚Äù button to shut down the VPS. And Click on the ‚ÄúInstall new OS‚Äù button on the left. Choose one of CentOS-6 with bbr and reload it. After reloading, click on the ‚ÄúShadowsocks Server‚Äù button on the left and Install Shadowsocks server. After completely installing, go back. Check the encryption method, server port and server password. Change them if you want. Install from packet by ÁßãÊ∞¥ÈÄ∏ÂÜ∞Reference - offical website of ÁßãÊ∞¥ÈÄ∏ÂÜ∞ Install Putty on your PC (In putty, right click the green box equals to paste, so no need to type word by word) Open Putty, enter IP address and SSH port of the VPS If it‚Äôs the first time you‚Äôve configured the VPS, you may see a security alert. Just choose Yes when the alert occurs. When it says login in as:, enter root, and you can get the initial password through the KiwiVM control panel‚Äì> Root password modification ‚Äì> Generate and set new root password After login in, you can enter passwd to reset the password as you want, then you don‚Äôt have to remember the irregular password generated by the system. Make sure your VPS has wget command 1yum -y install wget Enter and configure as your need 123wget --no-check-certificate -O shadowsocks-all.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teddysun/shadowsocks_install/master/shadowsocks-all.shchmod +x shadowsocks-all.sh./shadowsocks-all.sh 2>&1 | tee shadowsocks-all.log Successful if you get the following and record them: 123456Congratulations, your_shadowsocks_version install completed!Your Server IP :your_server_ipYour Server Port :your_server_portYour Password :your_passwordYour Encryption Method:your_encryption_method...... Multiuser configuration find your configuration file, the path might be /etc/shadowsocks.json, it actually depends the version of shadowsocks you‚Äôve installed. So enter vi /etc/shadowsocks.json to edit the configuration file. Type i to enter the insert mode and write in the configuration file: 1234567891011121314{ "server":"0.0.0.0", #which indicates the ip of your VPS "local_address": "127.0.0.1", "local_port":1080, "port_password": { "8381": "password1", "8382": "password2", "8383": "password3", "8384": "password4" }, "timeout":300, "method":"aes-256-cfb", #change it if you need "fast_open": true} Change the ports and password to what you need Save it( esc+:wq ) and enter 12killall ssserverssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d start Download Client Shadowsocks Win MacOS X Android iOS Shadowsocks-R Win MacOS X Android iOS Input your SS service information (encryption method, server port and server password) and start enjoying the Internet without any restrictions. Other use of VPSIf you regard those red or green notes as s**t, just skip this step. But if you want to fully use the VPS you buy, you can download torrents, build a private cloud or even host a website on it.
